product_name: Toad&Co Drover Denim Pants - Men's 32" Inseam
long_description: A modern take on the classic denim blue jean, the Horny Toad Drover Denim Pants with 32-in. inseam combine organic cotton and spandex for stretch that you'll love on your urban adventures.
